name: DOEL Freedom A9 AMD A9-9425 14.1" HD Laptop
description: The DOEL Freedom A9 is a 14.1" laptop from DOEL. It is the first laptop made in Bangladesh. The DOEL Freedom A9 is powered by an AMD A9-9425 processor (1MB Cache, 3.10GHz up to 3.70GHz). The AMD A9-9425 is an entry-level chip from the Stoney-Ridge APU series for notebooks. It has a 100 MHz higher CPU clock speed (base and boost) as well as a marginally faster GPU. It integrates two CPU cores (one Excavator module with 2 integers and an FP unit) clocked at 3.1 GHz to 3.7 GHz. It also includes a Radeon R5 GPU with 192 shaders at up to 900 MHz as well as a single-channel DDR4-2133 memory controller. The DOEL Freedom A9 comes with 4GB DDR4 RAM and a 240GB SATAIII M.2 SSD. It is integrated with AMD Radeon R5 Graphics and has a 14.1-inch HD (1366x768) Matte LED-backlit display with 45% NTSC. This laptop runs on Windows 10 operating system. The DOEL Freedom A9 offers a 1-year warranty.
short_description: Processor: AMD A9-9425 (1MB Cache, 3.10GHz up to 3.70GHz)
Features: HD Webcam, TF Card slot, Type-C

name: Toshiba Dynabook Satellite Pro C40-G-109 Celeron 5205U 14" HD Laptop
description: The Toshiba Dynabook Satellite Pro C40-G-109 Celeron 5205U 14" HD Laptop is powered by the Intel Celeron 5205U processor (2M Cache, 1.90 GHz) including UHD graphics, 4GB DDR4 3200MHz RAM, and 128GB M.2 SATA SSD. The laptop comes with a 14 Inch HD (1,366 x 768) 16:9 LED Backlit, Non-reflective Anti-Glare display. This 14" laptop offers all the tools you need for a productive work or study day. It has a large keyboard and large Precision Touch Pad-equipped ClickPad to provide comfort and control throughout the day. The Toshiba Dynabook Satellite Pro C40-G-109 is equipped with 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and Gigabit-LAN. The laptop comes with a full-size HDMI port makes big-screen presentations easy, and a microSD card reader lets you access portable storage whenever you need to. It also has a built-in USB Type-C that lets you charge, connect, display and transfer data through a single port. The Toshiba Dynabook Satellite Pro C40-G-109 Laptop comes with 2 years warranty.

name: Acer TravelMate TMB 311-31-C3CD Celeron N4020 11.6" HD Laptop
description: The Acer TravelMate TMB 311-31-C3CD Laptop comes with Intel Celeron N4020 (4M Cache, 1.10 GHz up to 2.80 GHz) and 4GB DDR4 RAM. It comes with a 256GB SSD. This laptop has integrated Intel UHD Graphics 600 and an 11.6" HD (1366 x 768) Display with ComfyView. It runs on the Free DOS operating system. It is powered by a 48 Wh 3-cell Li-ion battery. It comes with a 3-pin 45 W AC adapter. The laptop has two built-in stereo speakers (1.5Wx2=3W). It has a Standard Keyboard and HD Cam with Mic. It has been designed with 2 x USB, 1 x HDMI, 1 x Headset/speaker jack, and a power port. The Acer TravelMate TMB 311-31-C3CD has 3 years of warranty (Battery Adapter 01 year).
short_description: Processor: Intel Celeron N4020 (4M Cache, 1.10 GHz up to 2.80 GHz)

name: Lenovo IdeaPad D330 10IGL Intel CDC N4020 10.1" HD Touch Laptop
description: The Ideapad D330 has computing power and all the fun and mobility of a lightweight tablet. From multitasking to connecting with friends online and streaming shows. This Ideapad D330 featured 4GB DDR4 RAM, 128GB eMMC and Intel UHD 600 Graphics, and Windows 10 Home. The Lenovo Ideapad D330 comes with 10.1" (1280 x 800) HD IPS WXGA LED Antiscratch Brightness: 300nits, Aspect Ratio: 16:10, Color Gamut: 50% NTSC Display. This Lenovo IdeaPad D330 has an abundance of ports, including a USB-C 3.1 to help you charge other devices or transfer data at speeds up to 10 Gbps. Its display can generate lifelike clarity with 2S stereo Speakers Dolby Premium  Audio is the perfect combination for entertainment. This Lenovo IdeaPad D330 10IGL comes with 1 year Limited Warranty (1 year for Battery and Adapter, Terms & Conditions Apply As Per Lenovo)
short_description: Processor: Intel Celeron N4020 (4M Cache,1.10 GHz up to 2.80 GHz)

name: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i Celeron N4020 256GB SSD 15.6" HD Laptop with 3 Years Warranty
description: The Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i Laptop comes with Intel Celeron N4020 Processor (4M Cache,1.10 GHz up to 2.80 GHz) and 4GB DDR4 2400Mhz RAM. This laptop comes with 256GB NVMe PCIe SSD. It has been integrated with Intel UHD Graphics 600 and it runs on Windows 11 Home operating system. In this laptop, it has 2 x USB 3.1 (Gen 1)USB 2.0, HDMI 1.4b, Headphone / mic combo, 2 x 1.5W speakers Dolby Audio Ports, Connectors & Slots and Finger Print Sensor.  This laptop is also featured with a 2 Cell Li-Polymer battery, Full-size English (US) keyboard, 720p HD Webcam with Privacy Shutter, and an SD card reader. Here, WiFi 2 x 2, 1 x 1 AC and Bluetooth Version 5.0 Network & Wireless Connectivity are available. The Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i Laptop offers 03 years Limited Warranty (Terms & Conditions Apply As Per Lenovo).
short_description: Processor: Intel Celeron N4020 (4M Cache,1.10 GHz up to 2.80 GHz)

name: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i Celeron N4020 14" FHD Laptop
description: The Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i is a lightweight and stylish laptop with a 14-inch FHD LED display and a 1920 x 1080 resolution, making it ideal for comfortable and clear viewing. The laptop is powered by an Intel Celeron N4020 CPU with 4M cache and a maximum speed of 2.80 GHz. It also includes 4GB DDR4 RAM and a 256GB SSD for quick and efficient storage. In terms of connectivity, the Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i comes with WiFi and Bluetooth 5.0, as well as a variety of ports including one USB 2.0 Type-A port, two USB 3.1 Gen 1 Type-A ports, an HDMI port, and a combo headphone and microphone port. It also has an SD card reader for multimedia card support.The laptop has integrated Intel UHD 600 Graphics and shared graphics memory access, making it ideal for general use and light gaming. Stereo speakers with 1.5W x2 output and Dolby Audio technology are included, as is a built-in HD camera for video conferencing. The laptop runs on Windows 11 Home and weighs just 1.7Kg, with dimensions of 359.2 x 236.5 x 19.9mm, making it a great choice for those who need a reliable and portable device for everyday use.
short_description: Processor: Intel Celeron N4020 (4M Cache,1.10 GHz up to 2.80 GHz)

name: Asus VivoBook 15 X515FA Core i3 10th Gen 15.6" FHD Laptop
description: Asus VivoBook 15 X515FA powered by Intel Core i3-10110U Processor (4M Cache, 2.10 GHz up to 4.10 GHz) with Intel UHD Graphics. This Vivobook delivers powerful performance and immersive visuals. Its NanoEdge display boasts wide 178Â° viewing angles and a matte anti-glare coating for a truly engaging experience. Inside, it is designed with a 1TB 5400 RPM SATA HDD that gives you the perfect combination of large storage capacity and fast data read/write speeds. ASUS Vivobook 15 X515 helps you get things done swiftly and efficiently. This ASUS Vivobook 15 X515 has a dual-storage design, that helps to superfast data performance and a large storage capacity. Install apps on the SSD for quicker response and loading times, and use the HDD to store large files such as movies, music libraries, and photo albums. In this VivoBook, the NanoEdge display gives ASUS Vivobook 15 X515 a vast screen area for an immersive viewing experience for work and play. Its wide-view Full HD panel features an anti-glare coating to reduce unwanted distractions from irritating glare and reflections. It also includes USB 3.2 Type-A and USB 2.0 ports, HDMI output, and a microSD card reader. It runs on Windows 11 Home operating system. The Latest Asus VivoBook 15 X515FA comes with 02 years International Limited Warranty (Battery 1 year).

Designed for daily computing and productivity while boasting innovative features, ASUS E510 gives you everything you need for work or play. This Asus VivoBook 15 E510MA is powered by Intel Celeron Dual Core N4020 (1.10 GHz up to 2.80 GHz, Cache 4MB) with Intel UHD Graphics 600.
